column4: how can I find out what went wrong during hardware detection:  is there some log or something?
how can I find out what went wrong during hardware detection:  is there some log or something?
how can I find out what went wrong during hardware detection:  is there some log or something?
I already asked you. What are you missing? Sound card? Video Card? What?
I'm not missing anything.... what do you mean?
Pay attention to your own question. Please
How are u installing? Using a cd or via net?
clean up with water the cd
It already happened with me and it was only a matter of cleaning
There's nothing wrong with the CD. I'm obsessed when it comes to keeping CDs and DVDs clean.
Percise if there is something blocking ROM from reading the CD, integrity scan would detect it.
have you tested it in another machine?
Well, I tested it on this one few months ago; it went well then (same CD). I added a TV card since then.
sorry. But there must be something wrong with the cd. Try the alternate
